content: big fat cable hat / 1 big fat cable hat by justina chong this hat was inspired by the knitters of instagram #knitting who are always sharing pictures of their lovely cabled hats it features seven big fat 12-stitch cables against a background of reverse stockinette wear it pointy or wear it round up to you it s your head pattern and images © 2014 justina chong anitsuj@gmail com big fat cable hat / 2 notes size should fit an adult head yarn approximately 160 yards of worsted weight yarn needles smaller needle us 5/3 75mm 40-inch circular needle larger needle us 10/6mm 40-inch circular needle notions cable needle stitch markers yarn needle gauge 28 stitches = 4 inches in ribbing on smaller needles unstretched 24 stitches = 4 inches in cable pattern on larger needles magic loop hat is knit in the round using the magic loop method cable guide c12f - cable 12 front slip next 6 stitches onto cable needle and hold at front of work knit next 6 stitches from left-hand needle then knit stitches from cable needle c6f - cable 6 front slip next 3 stitches onto cable needle and hold at front of work knit next 3 stitches from left-hand needle then knit stitches from cable needle pattern and images © 2014 justina chong anitsuj@gmail com big fat cable hat / 3 pattern ribbed brim with smaller needles cast on 100 stitches join to work in round being careful not to twist work in k2 p2 rib until piece measures 2 inches increase round work in k2 p2 rib for 20 stitches m1 repeat from * to end of round total 105 stitches cable section switch to larger needles rounds 1 to 11 -
